properties.Observed p: There are 4 springs located next to each other above lake. Small tanks have been built for three springs. About 57 families use water.

Located within the reserve boundaries belonging to the Forest Conservation Department. Currently, about 50 families obtain water informally using pipes. It is appropriate to implement a formal water project with the permission of the Forest Conservation
